GalaxyController - Class in com.vs.starnet.star.controller
This controller serves as an interface between HTTP requests and the GalaxyService business logic for CRUD operations on stars.

GalaxyService - Class in com.vs.starnet.star.service
manages the functionality of a system with a sol performs tasks such as registration, updates, deregistration, and discovery of stars using both HTTP and UDP protocols.
